- mopub sdk
- version pinpointing in java side has a bug, debug with this:
- smali/com/mopub/common/Mopub.smali

- okhttp SDK
- okhttp < 3.2.0
- okhttp < 2.7.5
- https://publicobject.com/2016/02/11/okhttp-certificate-pinning-vulnerability/
- https://medium.com/square-corner-blog/vulnerability-in-okhttps-certificate-pinner-2a7326ad073b#.lkmvrf7n6
- Two names for the same library!
    - /data/gpl_violation/data/play-latest/com.rediff.mail.and-35.apk
        - flagged 2.7.1 / 3.0.1
        - actual 3.0.0
    - /data/gpl_violation/data/play-latest/com.peaksel.wallpapersforgirls-41.apk
        - flagged 2.2.0 /
        - actual 2.2.0
    - /data/gpl_violation/data/play-latest/com.newsblur-127.apk
        - flagged 2.7.5
        - actual 3.2.0
    - /data/gpl_violation/data/play-latest/z.playw.hh3-24.apk
        - flagged  1.5.3
        - actual no matches
- /data/gpl_violation/data/play-latest/au.com.tapstyle-289.apk
    - flagged 2.7.1 or 3.1.0
    - Okhttp 3.4.1

- dropbox sdk
- /data/gpl_violation/data/play-latest/com.seagate.android.dashboard-1004023000.apk
- flagged: 2.0.6
- actual: 1.6.3
